modelCorrections.rawOutput:
- Thought: To make the HTML document accessible and compliant with WCAG 2.1 guidelines, I need to add the "lang" attribute to the <html> element to specify the primary language of the document. This helps assistive technologies like screen readers to correctly interpret and pronounce the content for users with disabilities.

- Corrected HTML: <html lang="en">
